attributes.action: Introduce a tax on Jet Fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the easiest ways to reduce our impact on the environment would be to introduce a tax on aviation or jet fuel. If this fuel had the same taxes as petrol or diesel, then there would be a significant drop in carbon emissions throughout the world. Our government needs to be brave and have the courage to introduce it. Other governments would then follow and we would be a step closer to reducing our impact on climate change.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Introduce a tax on Jet Fuel."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14964.asp

Prime Minister's Office
